addr: 133 W 21st St. Room 101C. New York, NY 10011
title: Community Lecture: Unconscious Coupling: Dimensions of Interpersonal-Psychoanalytic Systemic Couples Therapy
desc: Shelly Goldklank, PhD Lectures are FREE to the public. CEC?s available for ATR-BC?s. This lecture will describe what couple members in couples therapy say helps or hinders them, and additionally, some crucial diagnostic dimensions for organizing couples data.? All of the above will be illustrated with clinical anecdotes. Shelly Goldklank is Teaching and Supervising Faculty, William Alanson White Institute; Director of the Psychodynamic Track and Associate Professor, Ferkauf Graduate School of Psychology, Yeshiva University; Associate Editor, Contemporary Psychoanalysis. Dr. Goldklank has been treating individuals, couples, and families for four decades and teaching, writing, and speaking about psychoanalytic/systemic couple and family therapy for thirty years.
